verses.name: Job 21:8
verses.text: Their seed is established in their sight with them, and their offspring before their eyes.

verses.name: Job 21:9
verses.text: Their houses are safe from fear, neither is the rod of God upon them.

verses.name: Job 21:10
verses.text: Their bull gendereth, and faileth not; their cow calveth, and casteth not her calf.

verses.name: Job 21:11
verses.text: They send forth their little ones like a flock, and their children dance.

verses.name: Job 21:12
verses.text: They take the timbrel and harp, and rejoice at the sound of the organ.

verses.name: Job 21:13
verses.text: They spend their days in wealth, and in a moment go down to the grave.
